children: Gets the features of the Boston Housing Dataset. This is a 506x13 Matrix of Float64 datatypes.
The values are in the order [“crim”,“zn”,“indus”,“chas”,“nox”,“rm”,“age”,“dis”,“rad”,“tax”,“ptratio”,“b”,“lstat”].

julia> using Flux
julia> features = Flux.Data.Housing.features()
julia> summary(features)
506×13 Array{Float64,2}
julia> features[1, :]
13-element Array{Float64,1}:
0.00632
18.0
2.31
0.0
0.538
   ⋮
296.0
